title: PACT Database Extension Schema
description: A Pathfinder Data Model Extension to identify the database version that the datapoint is stored in.

id.description: Unique identifier for the database instance

active.description: Indicates if the database is currently active

start_date.description: Start date of the database validity period in UTC with timezone (ISO 8601 format)

end_date.description: End date of the database validity period in UTC with timezone (ISO 8601 format)

type.description: Type or category of the database

access.description: Access level or permissions for the database

trust.description: Trust level or reliability indicator of the database

usageComment.description: Additional comments about database usage or context
